subject: Re: I just posted 2 new evp's in the 11-11- 07 folder.
author: bhali333
full_text:
Sorry Dave Once again I can not honestly say I hear anything in those 
two files, but hang in there it takes some time to get through the 
learning curve.

bruce

>

for
